text:
@BarackObama Dear Mr Joe Biden, our next president, Here is a fine event you may copy - it may be risky, as you are old and in the high-risk-group, like President Donald Trump, as he meets and talking with recovered COVID-19 patients - and listening to their stories
https://t.co/QDTWNp0Dai
